questions: Can you provide insights into your experience in the Information Technology industry over the past 7.3 years?
Could you elaborate on the personal reasons that led to your employment gap of 1.5 years?
How have you stayed up-to-date with industry trends and advancements during your career?
Can you discuss a significant project or accomplishment from your past roles that highlights your skills and expertise?
How do you approach problem-solving and decision-making in your professional work?
What technical skills or certifications do you possess that are relevant to your field?
How do you adapt to changes and challenges within the technology industry?
Can you provide an example of a time when you successfully collaborated with a team to achieve a common goal?
How do you prioritize tasks and manage your time effectively in a fast-paced work environment?
What are your career goals and how do you plan to achieve them in the future?
